text: The world today,

of climate change.

But of course,

I'm from Uganda.

The frustrated woman looked at me

an opportunity for Africa

the following three points have always

It is time that we take

what will they win or lose

This has always helped us.

Today, the world is celebrating

We are celebrating the progress.

Of course, I'm also worried.

I'm worried that the climate crisis

especially between the global
North and the global South.

I'm also worried that the rich

The rural and urban.
Why?

"The night is long for a hungry child."
What an image.
